mapper.select: SELECT ID AS PROJECT_ID, CODE, DESCRIPTION, END_DATE, MANAGER_EMP_ID, NAME, ORG_CODE, PRODUCTS_COLLECTION_TYPE, START_DATE, STATUS, CATEGORY, CUSTOMER, USER_ID, IS_DELETE, PRODUCTION_BRAND, CUSTOMER_PROJECT_NAME, CUSTOMER_PROJECT_TYPE, IS_MUST_AUDI FROM DM_PROJECT WHERE ID=#{PROJECT_ID}

SELECT ID, PROJECT_ID, CHANNEL_SYNC_ID, SCHEDULE_NUM, PLAN_START_TIME, PLAN_FINISHED_TIME, EMP_CODE, STATUS, EXEC_STATUS, AUDIT_STATUS, SCHEDULE_TYPE, AUDI_USER_ID, AUDI_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, C1, C2, C3, C4, C5, C6, C7, C8, C9, C10, C11, C12, C13, C14, C15, C16, C17, C18, C19, C20, C21, C22, C23, C24, C25, C26, C27, C28, C29, C30, C31, C32, C33, C34, C35, C36, C37, C38, C39, C40, C41, C42, C43, C44, C45, C46, C47, C48, C49, C50, C51, C52, C53, C54, C55, C56, C57, C58, C59, C60, C61, C62, C63, C64, C65, C66, C67, C68, C69, C70, C71, C72, C73, C74, C75, C76, C77, C78, C79, C80, C81, C82, C83, C84, C85, C86, C87, C88, C89, C90, C91, C92, C93, C94, C95, C96, C97, C98, C99, C100, CITY_EMP_CODE, UPDATE_USER, PLAN_SALES_COUNT, OLD_PLAN_START_TIME, OLD_PLAN_FINISHED_TIME, CUST_DEPUTY_NAME, CUST_DEPUTY_PHONE, CUST_DIRECTOR_NAME, CUST_DIRECTOR_PHONE, CUST_MANAGER_NAME, CUST_MANAGER_PHONE, SELLIN_CHANNEL, CUST_CHANNEL, CUST_SYS, CUST_CHANNEL_CODE, CUST_CHANNEL_NAME, PLAN_EXEC_DATE_TIME, PLAN_COM_EXEC_DATE_TIME, PLAN_THREE_PAY_EXEC_DATE_TIME, PLAN_EXEC_STORE_TIME, PLAN_COM_EXEC_STORE_TIME, PLAN_THREE_PAY_EXEC_STORE_TIME, PLAN_EXHIBIT_TYPE, PLAN_EXHIBIT_START_TIME, PLAN_EXHIBIT_END_TIME, PLAN_STORE_PATROL_COUNT, PLAN_WEEK_STORE_PATROL_COUNT, PLAN_MONTH_STORE_PATROL_COUNT, TOTAL_SALES_TARGET, DAILY_SOTRE_SALES_TARGET FROM DM_PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID} AND SCHEDULE_NUM = #{SCHEDULE_NUM} AND CHANNEL_SYNC_ID = #{CHANNEL_SYNC_ID}

SELECT ID, PROJECT_ID, CHANNEL_SYNC_ID, SCHEDULE_NUM, PLAN_START_TIME, PLAN_FINISHED_TIME, EMP_CODE, STATUS, EXEC_STATUS, AUDIT_STATUS, SCHEDULE_TYPE, AUDI_USER_ID, AUDI_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, C1, C2, C3, C4, C5, C6, C7, C8, C9, C10, C11, C12, C13, C14, C15, C16, C17, C18, C19, C20, C21, C22, C23, C24, C25, C26, C27, C28, C29, C30, C31, C32, C33, C34, C35, C36, C37, C38, C39, C40, C41, C42, C43, C44, C45, C46, C47, C48, C49, C50, C51, C52, C53, C54, C55, C56, C57, C58, C59, C60, C61, C62, C63, C64, C65, C66, C67, C68, C69, C70, C71, C72, C73, C74, C75, C76, C77, C78, C79, C80, C81, C82, C83, C84, C85, C86, C87, C88, C89, C90, C91, C92, C93, C94, C95, C96, C97, C98, C99, C100, CITY_EMP_CODE, UPDATE_USER, PLAN_SALES_COUNT, OLD_PLAN_START_TIME, OLD_PLAN_FINISHED_TIME, CUST_DEPUTY_NAME, CUST_DEPUTY_PHONE, CUST_DIRECTOR_NAME, CUST_DIRECTOR_PHONE, CUST_MANAGER_NAME, CUST_MANAGER_PHONE, SELLIN_CHANNEL, CUST_CHANNEL, CUST_SYS, CUST_CHANNEL_CODE, CUST_CHANNEL_NAME, PLAN_EXEC_DATE_TIME, PLAN_COM_EXEC_DATE_TIME, PLAN_THREE_PAY_EXEC_DATE_TIME, PLAN_EXEC_STORE_TIME, PLAN_COM_EXEC_STORE_TIME, PLAN_THREE_PAY_EXEC_STORE_TIME, PLAN_EXHIBIT_TYPE, PLAN_EXHIBIT_START_TIME, PLAN_EXHIBIT_END_TIME, PLAN_STORE_PATROL_COUNT, PLAN_WEEK_STORE_PATROL_COUNT, PLAN_MONTH_STORE_PATROL_COUNT, TOTAL_SALES_TARGET, DAILY_SOTRE_SALES_TARGET FROM DM_PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID}

INSERT INTO DM_SELLIN_HISTORY (ID,PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_LOG_ID,CHANGE_TIMES,CREATE_TIME) VALUES (#{ID},#{PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_LOG_ID},#{CHANGE_TIMES},#{CREATE_TIME})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_LOG_ID, CHANGE_TIMES, CREATE_TIME FROM DM_SELLIN_HISTORY WHERE PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_LOG_ID in (select id from DM_PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_LOG where #{ID} = SOURCE_ID)

SELECT ID, CHANNEL_CODE, CHANNEL, PROJECT, REQUIRED_SALES_NUMBER FROM DM_PROJECT_STORE WHERE CHANNEL = #{CHANNEL} AND PROJECT = #{PROJECT}
AND CHANNEL_CODE = #{CHANNEL_CODE}

SELECT dpsi.id, dpsi.project_sellin_info_id, dpsi.so_update_user, dpsi.so_update_time, dpsi.so_create_user, dpsi.so_create_time, dpsi.so_status, dpsi.so_plan_open_time, dpsi.so_plan_finish_time, dpsi.so_open_time, dpsi.so_open_type, dpsi.so_exhibit_type, dpsi.so_enter_time, dpsi.so_leave_time, dpsi.so_patrol_time, dpsi.so_patrol_position_status, dpsi.so_exhibit_photos, dpsi.so_sales_photos, dpsi.so_exec_emp_code, dpsi.so_special_situation, dpsi.so_upload_time, dpsi.so1, dpsi.so2, dpsi.so3, dpsi.so4, dpsi.so5, dpsi.so6, dpsi.so7, dpsi.so8, dpsi.so9, dpsi.so10, dpsi.so_report_type, dpsi.so_report_user, dpsi.audi_status, dpsi.audi_opinion, dpsi.audi_user, dpsi.audi_time, dpsi.so_sales_exhibit_type, dpsi.so_sales_exhibit_photos, dpsi.so_sales_open_photos, dpsi.so_sales_action_photos, dpsi.so_sales_compet_photos, dpsi.so_sales_open_code, dpsi.so_sales_report_time, dpsi.so_sales_question_feedback FROM dm_project_sellin_store_open dpsi inner join DM_PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO dpse on dpsi.PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_ID = dpse.ID and dpse.PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT} and dpse.CHANNEL_SYNC_ID = #{CHANNEL}

SELECT dpse.ID, dpse.PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_ID, dpse.HEADER_ID, dpse.EXEC_DATE FROM DM_PROJECT_SELLIN_EXECDATE dpse inner join DM_PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO dpsi on dpse.PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_ID = dpsi.ID where dpsi.ID = #{PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_ID} and dpsi.CHANNEL_SYNC_ID = #{CHANNEL} order by dpse.EXEC_DATE asc

mapper.select: SELECT EMP_PK, EMP_TYPE, EMP_CODE, AD_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_S_CODE, EMP_GENDER, EMP_TITLE, HIRE_DATE, LEAVE_DATE, EMP_ADDR, EMP_PHONE, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_STATUS, MEMO, CRT_APP, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPD_APP, UPD_USER, UPD_TIME, IS_DEL, WORK_AD_ID, RANK, RESIDENT_NATURE, PROMOTER_TYPE, CONTRACT_CODE, CONTRACT_START_DATE, CONTRACT_END_DATE, ORG_CODE, COMPANY_CODE, WORK_TYPE, EMP_POSITION FROM MD_EMP WHERE EMP_CODE = #{EMP_CODE} AND IS_DEL = 0

SELECT EMP_PK, EMP_TYPE, EMP_CODE, AD_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_S_CODE, EMP_GENDER, EMP_TITLE, HIRE_DATE, LEAVE_DATE, EMP_ADDR, EMP_PHONE, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_STATUS, MEMO, CRT_APP, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPD_APP, UPD_USER, UPD_TIME, IS_DEL, WORK_AD_ID, RANK, RESIDENT_NATURE, PROMOTER_TYPE, CONTRACT_CODE, CONTRACT_START_DATE, CONTRACT_END_DATE, ORG_CODE, COMPANY_CODE, WORK_TYPE, EMP_POSITION FROM MD_EMP WHERE EMP_CODE = #{EMP_CODE} AND IS_DEL = 0 AND EMP_TYPE = 1002

mapper.delete: delete from DM_PROJECT_SELLIN_STORE_OPEN WHERE PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_ID = #{ID} AND AUDI_STATUS = 0
mapper.select: SELECT ID, PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_ID, HEADER_ID, EXEC_DATE FROM DM_PROJECT_SELLIN_EXECDATE WHERE PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_ID = #{PROJECT_SELLIN_INFO_ID} ORDER BY EXEC_DATE

SELECT ID, DISPLAY_NAME, EMP_PK, EMP_NAME, ORG_CODE, EMP_ORG_TITLE, LOGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, STATUS, PERMISSION_ROLE, DISABLE_IMEI_VALIDATE, IMEI, OFA_CREATED_AT, LAST_LATITUDE, LAST_LONGITUDE, LAST_UPDATED_AT, LAST_UPDATED_ON, ORG_TYPE, PASSWORD_UPDATE_TIME FROM DM_USER WHERE EMP_PK = #{EMP_PK}

SELECT COUNT(*) num FROM dm_sales_schedule_calendar ssc INNER JOIN dm_project_sellin_sales pss ON ssc.Sales_Id=pss.id INNER JOIN dm_project_sellin_info psi ON psi.id=pss.project_sellin_info_id WHERE 1=1 AND psi.id= #{ID}
